{"step_by_step_thinking": "Durvalumab is a monoclonal antibody that is used for the treatment of certain types of lung cancer. It is specifically indicated for the treatment of locally advanced or metastatic non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) that has not progressed after concurrent platinum-based chemotherapy and radiation therapy. Therefore, the answer is yes, durvalumab is used for lung cancer treatment.", "answer_choice": "A"}
